LanguageData.AF_Hediff_ARD01_Base.label: Sydaily Stun
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_ARD01_Base.description: The Sydaily Crystal Weapon is in safe mode, the switch isn't lethal, but it's still painful. \nParts of the body may adapt to this magical experience, resulting in a "benign mutation. ".
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.stages.0.label: Survive

LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.stages.2.label: Erupting
LanguageData.AF_Hediff_AGBs41_Base.stages.3.label: In Progress
